description: The initiative focuses on sustainable pest control through conservation biological control, led by Esther Molina in Almer√≠a, Spain. By utilizing natural predators and creating a balanced ecosystem within her greenhouses, she minimizes the need for chemical pesticides. This innovative approach not only promotes biodiversity but also enhances crop health. Esther's work, supported by research institutions, aims to educate others in the agricultural sector about alternative pest management methods, fostering a more sustainable farming community.
name: Esther Molina
